column1:
Offer installments payments with Alma and instantly boost your sales.
Increase average order value by 60% and your sales by 20%.
With no subscription fees and no commitment, it’s risk free: you are paid upfront while your customers pay later.
column2:
Offer installments payments with Alma and instantly boost your sales.
Increase average order value by 60% and your sales by 20%.
With no subscription fees and no commitment, it’s risk free: you are paid upfront while your customers pay later.

column1:
Some products (gift cards, license keys, software, weapons, ...) cannot be sold with Alma, as per our terms (see Exclusions paragraph).

If you are selling such products on your shop, you need to configure Alma so that it is not enabled when customers view or shop them.
column2:
Some products (gift cards, license keys, software, weapons, ...) cannot be sold with Alma, as per our terms (see Exclusions paragraph).

If you are selling such products on your shop, you need to configure Alma so that it is not enabled when customers view or shop them.

column1: This option is available only for Alma payment in 2x, 3x and 4x. When it's turned on, your clients will pay the first installment at the order status change. When your client order on your website, Alma will only ask for a payment authorization. Only status handled by Alma are available in the menu below. Please contact Alma if you need us to add another status.
column2: This option is available only for Alma payment in 2x, 3x and 4x. When it's turned on, your clients will pay the first installment at the order status change. When your client order on your website, Alma will only ask for a payment authorization. Only status handled by Alma are available in the menu below. Please contact Alma if you need us to add another status.
